name: Phase (HillE ~, LeftOut, Trevor Dodd)
description:
Platformer for the Pigsquad Stealth Summer Slowjam 2022.


You are a cat. You have passed on. But you are not going to let that stop you from getting back to your human.

You have the ability to phase between two planes. And you must get past spirits who wish to catch you. Since you cannot attack these demons so you must find your way past them.


Programming and (some) art by me.
Music and Sound by Trevor Dodd: https://trevor-dodd.itch.io/
Additional coding help by Devin Miller: https://leftout.itch.io/

Additional art assets pulled from Itch.io:

  • *Anzimuz
    *vnitti
